item.title: What are the different commands or operations in GitHub?
item.description: As a public repository, GitHub mainly restored the source code from the local system, using git to control the software version. There are several commands frequently used from local git to Github…

item.title: What is the difference between code build and compilations?
item.description: In software development, a build is the process of converting source code files into standalone software artifact(s) that can be run on a computer, or the result of doing so. In terms of compilation, they are two different concepts….

item.title: What is VCS?
item.description: Version control systems are a category of software tools that help a software team manage changes to source code over time…

item.title: What is a GitHub repository?
item.description: Github repository is usually used to organize a single project. Repositories can contain folders and files, images, videos, spreadsheets, and data sets – anything your project needs…
